info.name: LocalPro API - Client Role
info.description: Complete API collection for Client users. Includes authentication, marketplace browsing, bookings, activities, academy enrollment, support, and personal account management.

item.name: Login with Email OTP - Send Code

request.description: Request OTP code for email login
Verify email OTP and get authentication token

item.name: Marketplace
item.description: Browse and book services from the marketplace

request.description: Get details of a specific service
Get services associated with my account
Get details of a service provider
Get all services offered by a provider

body.raw:
{
  "serviceId": "{{serviceId}}",
  "providerId": "{{providerId}}",
  "scheduledDate": "2024-12-20",
  "scheduledTime": "10:00",
  "duration": 60,
  "address": {
    "street": "123 Main St",
    "city": "Manila",
    "state": "Metro Manila",
    "zipCode": "1000"
  },
  "notes": "Please arrive on time",
  "paymentMethod": "cash"
}

request.description: Get details of a specific booking
Add a review for a completed booking
Reschedule a booking to a new date
Add a tip for the service provider
Get current provider location for active booking
Open a dispute for a booking
Get dispute details for a booking
Add a message to the dispute thread
Get all messages in a dispute
Add a detailed review with category ratings
Upload photos to accompany your review
Get services by category with sorting
Calculate total price with packages, add-ons, and promotions
Check if service is available on a specific date/time
Get details of a specific job

body.raw:
{
  "coverLetter": "I am very interested in this position and believe my skills match your requirements...",
  "resumeUrl": "https://example.com/resume.pdf",
  "expectedSalary": 50000,
  "availableDate": "2024-01-15",
  "answers": []
}

request.description: Get details of a specific course
Add a review for a course
Like or interact with an activity
Add a comment to an announcement
Get all replies for a ticket

item.name: Account Security
item.description: Account security features including 2FA, sessions, and password management

request.description: Setup two-factor authentication. Returns QR code for authenticator apps.
Verify and activate 2FA with code from authenticator app
Generate new backup codes (requires current 2FA code)
Add current device to trusted devices
Remove a device from trusted devices

item.name: Privacy & Compliance
item.description: Privacy settings, GDPR compliance, and data management

request.description: Set Do Not Sell preference (CCPA compliance)
Export all user data (GDPR right of access)
Download user data as JSON file
Check if a specific agreement version is accepted
